rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: Initial Letter or Follow Up Letter >10

value.stringValue: CASE([CommunicationDeadline__c].Type__c, 'Initial Letter', '20 - Send New Initial Contractor Letters (10+)', 'Follow Up Letter', '07 - Send Follow Up Letters to Non-Subscribers (10+)',null)

formulas.name: formula_2_myRule_1_A1_9481062940
formulas.expression: CASE({!myVariable_current.Type__c}, 'Initial Letter', '20 - Send New Initial Contractor Letters (10+)', 'Follow Up Letter', '07 - Send Follow Up Letters to Non-Subscribers (10+)',null)
